snippet.title: Wand Wars Endless Trials Update Trailer
snippet.description:
Ride brooms, cast spells and transform your opponents into adorable chickens in this intense magical sport.

Website: http://wandwars.com

The game's epic stages, colourful characters and quirky powerups generate competitive gameplay that is incredibly fun to participate in and spectate. 

Hone your skills and uncover the magical universe of Wand Wars in the story mode. Battle your way through the unlimited chaos of the endless trials and enhance your abilities using magical cards. Challenge your friends or the computer in 5 exciting local multiplayer modes across 10 unique arenas.

http://wandwars.com
